Description: Drata IAM Role to set read permissions in Org Member Accounts

RolePrincipalAWS.Description: Management Account ID for this Organization
RolePrincipalAWS.ConstraintDescription: ManagementAccountID must be 12 in length and contain numeric characters

RoleSTSExternalID.Description: STS ExternalId condition value to use with the role
RoleSTSExternalID.ConstraintDescription: STS ExternalId condition value to use with the role must contain alphanumeric characters and only these special characters are allowed =,.@:/-.

Properties.Description: Cross-account read-only access for Drata Autopilot
